Tau Ventures

Tau Ventures is an AI-first, early-stage venture capital fund focused on healthcare, enterprise, and automation. They invest primarily in seed rounds, with opportunistic investments in Series A, B, and C rounds. The firm has a strong network of partners and advisors.
